description: This week we bring you super good looking stud Zander.We met this guy while cruising a mall in this popular college town. Once we saw him, we knew that he would be a perfect Next Door Male. So one of the ladies that we were with approached him and asked if he'd be willing to jerk off for her. At first he didn't know what to say, but he got with the program and blurted out 'Hell yeah'. She told him that she was just kidding, but would like him to do a solo for our site. She passed him a card and he said he'd consider it. Before we even got back to our car, the phone rang and guess who; Zander. He was willing to give it a shot.So here he is, Zander, stroking himself on the couch, lathering up his body in the shower, and shooting a nice powerful load onto his chest...all for your enjoyment. Have fun and happy New Year from Next Door Studios!
title: Zander
